actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT DISTINCT 
    CASE 
        WHEN day = 1 THEN 'Sunday'
        WHEN day = 2 THEN 'Monday'
        WHEN day = 3 THEN 'Tuesday'
        WHEN day = 4 THEN 'Wednesday'
        WHEN day = 5 THEN 'Thursday'
        WHEN day = 6 THEN 'Friday'
        WHEN day = 7 THEN 'Saturday'
    END AS name,
		day AS code
FROM reports
ORDER BY day;
